CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App suggestions by task in In-context Stores
CurrentVersion.description: Users think about which tasks they need to complete such as creating a survey inside Teams. Now, app suggestions will be organized by tasks the apps support as opposed to conventional categories (productivity, project management). As a result, the new categorization will reduce the amount of time users need to spend learning about these apps – helping them to work more effectively. The task-based app suggestions will be added to the Tabs, Messaging Extension, and Bots in-context Stores.

suggestions will be added to the Tabs, Messaging Extension, and Bots in-context
Stores.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage – Campaign Hub
CurrentVersion.description: Employees will discover new and ongoing campaigns in the campaign hub in Viva Engage. This allows employees to browse and filter all campaigns, present and past, view trending and sponsored campaigns with the option of following campaigns directly from this page.  This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is a duplicate of 124952.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage – Campaign Hub
OldVersion.description: Employees will discover new and ongoing campaigns in the campaign hub in Viva Engage. This allows employees to browse and filter all campaigns, present and past, view trending and sponsored campaigns with the option of following campaigns directly from this page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Microsoft Shell integration in Viva Learning webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an Application Header similar to other Microsoft M365 webapps. It will help users to easily switch between Microsoft webapps.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Microsoft Shell integration in Viva Learning webapp
OldVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an Application Header similar to other Microsoft M365 webapps. It will help users to easily switch between Microsoft webapps.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Browsed to generative AI websites indicator
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this update, we are adding a new indicator, “browsed to generative AI sites,” for the risky browser usage policy template, giving visibility into organizational usage of generative AI domains. User information is pseudonymized by default with strong privacy controls in place to protect end user trust. While visiting one of these AI domains may be authorized by an organization, this indicator is designed to help ensure they are correctly accounting for whether and how, these sites may be accessed in policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
CurrentVersion.description: ,A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Modernized user-defined permissions experience
OldVersion.description: ,A modernized experience for selecting which users should have which permissions when a sensitivity label configured for user-defined permissions is applied to a file in M365 apps or when a user applies protection using standalone Information Rights Management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External call routing settings
CurrentVersion.description: End users will now be able to change their external call routing settings directly from the Teams app, allowing them to decide how incoming PSTN calls are routed. Calls can be redirected based on existing unanswered call settings or sent to voicemail. This new capability provides more flexibility for handling customer communications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: External call routing settings
OldVersion.description: End users will now be able to change their external call routing settings directly from the Teams app, allowing them to decide how incoming PSTN calls are routed. Calls can be redirected based on existing unanswered call settings or sent to voicemail. This new capability provides more flexibility for handling customer communications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Site-level video analytics dashboard
CurrentVersion.description:
,This dashboard gives access to aggregated analytics for videos on a SharePoint site. This feature will go live in late January for customers enrolled in the private preview of Stream advanced video analytics. Customers interested in applying to join the private preview may submit an application via the URL associated with this roadmap item. We expect the dashboard to enter general availability in June. The metrics on this dashboard are divided into the following sections: First, the Lifetime Video report contains 3 metrics for videos on the SharePoint site—Total Views, Unique Viewers, and Average Watch Rate. Second, Video Traffic report shows views and viewer patterns across the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. Third, Video Usage shows views by device and geolocation. Fourth, Top 20 Videos shows a list of the most popular videos on the SharePoint site in the last week.
More info: https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=v4j5cvGGr0GRqy180BHbRxtVxJyO0BFOoG0pvqGnDONUM0dCQU9LMkpUUkkwWU9FR0NORUVNTExJSy4u

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: OneDrive – Share Word Documents with AI summary
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now opt to include an AI-generated document summary inside the share dialog when they share a Word document with other users. The document summary is included in the share notification email sent to the recipient(s) giving them more context around the contents of the shared document. This feature is only enabled for customers with a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and works only when sharing a Word for the web file.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: OneDrive – Share Word Documents with AI summary
OldVersion.description: Users can now opt to include an AI-generated document summary inside the share dialog when they share a Word document with other users. The document summary is included in the share notification email sent to the recipient(s) giving them more context around the contents of the shared document. This feature is only enabled for customers with a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and works only when sharing a Word for the web file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap and meeting artifacts automatically shared in chat after meeting
CurrentVersion.description: Shortly after a meeting ends, meeting participants will automatically get a set of all the artifacts from the meeting in the meeting chat. Included in this set is a quick entry point to the meeting recap page, the transcript, the recording, Collaborative notes, any files that were shared, a link to any Whiteboard that was used, and the meeting details like date and time of the meeting event. For users with access to intelligent recap, in addition to the entry point to intelligent recap, users will also see highlights like number of speakers, number of name mentions, and suggested tasks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap and meeting artifacts automatically shared in chat after meeting
OldVersion.description: Shortly after a meeting ends, meeting participants will automatically get a set of all the artifacts from the meeting in the meeting chat. Included in this set is a quick entry point to the meeting recap page, the transcript, the recording, Collaborative notes, any files that were shared, a link to any Whiteboard that was used, and the meeting details like date and time of the meeting event. For Teams Premium users, in addition to the entry point to intelligent recap, users will also see highlights like number of speakers, number of name mentions, and suggested tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Minecraft Education: Minecraft Education Summer Release
CurrentVersion.description: ,The next major update for Minecraft Education will include support for preview applications which can be installed side-by-side with the main Minecraft Education application. This update will add OneDrive-based cloud world storage for backup of worlds. It will also include the major features from Minecraft 1.21 such as trial chambers, breezes, and armadillos.  More features will be announced soon!

OldVersion.title: Minecraft Education: Minecraft Education Summer Release
OldVersion.description: The next major update for Minecraft Education will include support for preview applications which can be installed side-by-side with the main Minecraft Education application. This update will add OneDrive-based cloud world storage for backup of worlds. It will also include the major features from Minecraft 1.21 such as trial chambers, breezes, and armadillos.  More features will be announced soon!

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Assigned to Me view for Project tasks
CurrentVersion.description: View and update (i.e. mark as complete and progress) all the tasks assigned to you across projects in one place, with the Assigned to Me view. This view appears in the app of the user’s choice—Microsoft Planner, Tasks app in Teams, or Microsoft To Do.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Assigned to Me view for Project tasks
OldVersion.description: View and update (i.e. mark as complete and progress) all the tasks assigned to you across projects in one place, with the Assigned to Me view. This view appears in the app of the user’s choice—Microsoft Planner, Tasks app in Teams, or Microsoft To Do.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot for Microsoft 365 in Teams chat on mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to easily access Copilot on the Teams mobile app.
